title: Highly Dependable Blockchain
description: Developed a secure blockchain using the IBFT consensus algorithm, handling Byzantine faults and securing authenthicity and integrity of transactions.
task: Implement a dependable blockchain using IBFT consensus algorithm to handle transactions securely and resist Byzantine faults.
solution: Enhanced an existing codebase to implement a secure blockchain. Developed tests using JUnit5 to ensure system dependability, and corrected the IBFT algorithm based on test outputs. Handled client-side transaction processing and ensured protection against replay attacks, double spending, and collaborating byzantine nodes.

title: Ambient Home Security System
description: Developed an ambient system prototype to monitor and ensure the safety of home appliances for at-risk individuals living alone.
task: Design a prototype ambient system to help at-risk individuals live independently by monitoring potentially dangerous home appliances.
solution: Implemented monitoring for an oven and a door using Raspberry Pi, Arduino, and Nicla Vision. The system includes a web interface built with Flask and React, displaying real-time status updates and activating a kill switch if necessary. Ensured usability with Tailwind CSS for design simplicity.

title: Secure Network for Health Records
description: Implemented a secure network for signing and accessing electronic health records using firewalls, authentication, and cryptography.
task: Create a secure system for managing electronic health records, ensuring confidentiality, integrity, and authenticity of data.
solution: Developed a custom cryptographic library for encrypting EHRs, set up a virtual network with firewalls and secure TLS/SSL communications using Vagrant and Virtualbox, and implemented digital signatures for authenticity. Used a mix of symmetric and asymmetric cryptography to protect data and secure key exchange.

title: IaC To-Do List Application
description: Deployed a scalable To-Do List application using Terraform, Ansible, and Vagrant for infrastructure-as-code on Google Cloud Platform.
task: Deploy a resilient and scalable To-Do List web application using an infrastructure-as-code approach with Terraform, Ansible, and Vagrant.
solution: Implemented core operations using Express.js microservices for adding/removing and checking/unchecking items, a React frontend, and a MongoDB database replica set for persistent storage. Set up and managed the infrastructure on Google Cloud Platform using Terraform for IaC and Ansible for configuration management, ensuring consistent environments across development and production. Integrated Prometheus and Grafana for monitoring system health and performance.
